network_service.h File Reference

Classes

class  Net::ServiceManager
 Manager of Kaapi servicesAn active message is send to a service. A service is an object that inherits from the service interface. A service has a name : a service identifier which is composed by two parts : a library namespace identifier and a user identifier. The namespace identifier allows to segment the name by library usage. More...
class  Net::Service
class  Net::ServiceError
 Service called to in case of unresolv service identifierOne object ServiceError exists per process. It is retrieved with call to ServiceManager::resolv(NETWORK_LNS, ERROR_SERVICE);. More...

Namespaces

namespace  Net
 

The Net namespace contains definitions for forming and sending active message over a network.
